name: Teleball VR Demo
description:
A small VR game I made, I might turn it into a full game at some point but for now here's the demo. I made it for the Oculus Quest 2 but it will probably run on most VR devices.

Check out a development series I made for this demo here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLF8CqCQJNOMfuBGLi_iWIvcjw3FcUsHXf
